00024 OSMNode* OSMMap::getNodePtrById( int id )
00025 {
00026   for( int i = 0; i < m_nodes.count(); i++ )
00027   {
00028     if( m_nodes[i].id() == id )
00029       return &m_nodes[i];
00030   }
00031   
00032   return 0;
00033 }

00087 void OSMMap::paint( QPainter* painter )
